headline.sub: Apple Beats combo? the cost of cool
headline.main: Apple Beats combo? the cost of cool

docs.snippet: Apple may be trying to get some street cred if it indeed buys headphone maker Beats Electronic for $3.2 billion, but Wall Street is scratching its head over the reported deal, which would be Apple's biggest.  Bobbi Rebell reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Apple may be trying to get some street cred if it indeed buys headphone maker Beats Electronic for $3.2 billion, but Wall Street is scratching its head over the reported deal, which would be Apple's biggest.  Bobbi Rebell reports.

headline.print_headline: Groups Say Thailand Should Face U.S. Sanctions Over Trafficking
headline.main: Groups Say Thailand Should Face U.S. Sanctions Over Trafficking

docs.snippet: Thailand should be liable to potential U.S. sanctions for failing to crack down on trafficking in migrant workers, a group of human rights and labor organizations said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Thailand should be liable to potential U.S. sanctions for failing to crack down on trafficking in migrant workers, a group of human rights and labor organizations said on Friday.

headline.print_headline: BSkyB Moves to Gain Control of Sky Deutschland, Sky Italia- Bloomberg
headline.main: BSkyB Moves to Gain Control of Sky Deutschland, Sky Italia- Bloomberg

docs.snippet: British Sky Broadcasting Group Plc is trying to gain control of Sky Deutschland AG and Sky Italia through a deal valued at 10 billion euros (8.16 billion pounds), Bloomberg reported quoting people familiar with the situation....
docs.lead_paragraph: British Sky Broadcasting Group Plc is trying to gain control of Sky Deutschland AG and Sky Italia through a deal valued at 10 billion euros (8.16 billion pounds), Bloomberg reported quoting people familiar with the situation.

docs.snippet: Should the N.F.L. pool its resources and let players decide where to work, or will some teams inevitably gain an unfair competitive advantage?...
docs.abstract: Should the N.F.L. pool its resources and let players decide where to work, or will some teams inevitably gain an unfair competitive advantage?

headline.sub: Dow hits record close, momentum rebounds
headline.main: Dow hits record close, momentum rebounds

docs.snippet: Summary: Blue chips closed at a record high boosted by Merck's drug approval; Momentum players like Netflix, Twitter, and Tesla rebound; Netflix boots membership fee; Apple investors pan Beats rumors.  Conway G. Gittens reports....
docs.lead_paragraph: Summary: Blue chips closed at a record high boosted by Merck's drug approval; Momentum players like Netflix, Twitter, and Tesla rebound; Netflix boots membership fee; Apple investors pan Beats rumors.  Conway G. Gittens reports.

headline.print_headline: FAA: Jet Nearly Collided With Drone Over Florida
headline.main: FAA: Jet Nearly Collided With Drone Over Florida

docs.snippet: Federal officials say a U.S. jet airliner nearly collided in March with an airborne drone in the sky over Tallahassee, Florida....
docs.lead_paragraph: Federal officials say a U.S. jet airliner nearly collided in March with an airborne drone in the sky over Tallahassee, Florida.

headline.print_headline: California Man Kills Three, Takes Own Life in Apparent Murder-Suicide: Police
headline.main: California Man Kills Three, Takes Own Life in Apparent Murder-Suicide: Police

docs.snippet: Police who found four people dead at a Southern California home said on Friday they believe the crime was a murder-suicide carried out by a man who fatally shot his girlfriend, her mother and teenage brother before turning the gun on himself....
docs.lead_paragraph: Police who found four people dead at a Southern California home said on Friday they believe the crime was a murder-suicide carried out by a man who fatally shot his girlfriend, her mother and teenage brother before turning the gun on himself.

headline.print_headline: Missouri Inmate Seeks to Stop His Execution Over Rare Health Problem
headline.main: Missouri Inmate Seeks to Stop His Execution Over Rare Health Problem

docs.snippet: A Missouri death row inmate wants to halt his execution because of a rare health condition his lawyers say would likely result in exceptional pain and possible suffocation....
docs.lead_paragraph: A Missouri death row inmate wants to halt his execution because of a rare health condition his lawyers say would likely result in exceptional pain and possible suffocation.

headline.print_headline: Man Suspected of Killing Alaska Troopers Indicted by Grand Jury
headline.main: Man Suspected of Killing Alaska Troopers Indicted by Grand Jury

docs.snippet: A man accused of killing two Alaska State Troopers who were featured in a reality TV series has been indicted by a grand jury while two other men face banishment from their town by a tribal government over the incident, authorities said on Friday....
docs.lead_paragraph: A man accused of killing two Alaska State Troopers who were featured in a reality TV series has been indicted by a grand jury while two other men face banishment from their town by a tribal government over the incident, authorities said on Friday.
